title: ListView pagination
subtitle: Paginated list implemented based on the ListView
description: This implementation uses the wrapper adapter which implements the WrapperListAdapter interface and accepts any kind of BaseAdapter as content. It adds and manages "Load More" view the same way the HeaderViewListAdapter does.

title: RecyclerView pagination
subtitle: Paginated list implemented based on the RecyclerView
description: This implementation based on the abstract PaginatedRecyclerAdapter which must be used as the parent of final adapters to add and manage "Load More" view below content items
